gloss: 可見.中距-那裡=遠距.主格

free: #e There was a small boy looking at a dog and a frog.
#c 在那裡有一個小孩看著狗和青蛙。
#e The dog is keeping a frog in a bottle.
#c 狗照顧一個裝水的瓶子裡面的青蛙。
#n al-ipu-a=s < al-ipu-an mas < al-haipu-an mas
#e The boy is also looking at the frog.
#c 那個小孩也一直看（青蛙）。
#n sa==du 一直看，有些人會唸sasadu表示

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格
free: #e There were shoes.
#c 那裡有鞋子。
#n sia在這裡作什麼？
#n pa-dingua=ku mais minadiip=in 到了打電話給我
#n pa-dingua=ku mais taunadiip=in 到了打電話給我
#e Here (on this page), the boy is holding the dog while sleeping.
#c 到了這裡小孩就抱著狗睡了。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格
free: #e Then the frog runs away.
#c 然後那隻青蛙就跑出去了。
#n naia=s < naia mas
#e They wanted to leave together.
#c 他們要和他成群地走。
#n minna-tasipal 到對岸，指到書的對頁
#e On this page, the boy iss still sleeping, but the dog isn’t.
#c 到了下一頁，小孩還在睡，但是狗沒有。
#e Then the frog is gone. Is it still inside the bottle?
#c 然後青蛙還沒有（在這裡），他是不是還在瓶子裡面？
#n 發音人自己的疑問
#e Is it still in the bottle? If not, then it must be in the shoes.
#c 是不是還在瓶子裡？不是的話，那麼會在鞋子裡面。
#n mai=ni=ai < mais nii hai 不是的話
#e It’s like that.
#c 他就那樣。
#n inkaduan 的用法要再確認
#n 這個sia不是很理解，a也不太理解，被撿到的應該是用mas標記，去撿到的應該用a標，但是這邊是孩子以為他可以撿到青蛙，後面的青蛙應該標mas才是
#e Then here, (the boy thingks) the frog might be in the shoes and maybe he will find the frog, so he lifts the shoes.
#c 然後這裡呢，（孩子以為）青蛙會在鞋子裡面，可以找到青蛙，所以他把鞋子搬起來。
#e Then the dog is searching as well.
#c 然後那隻狗一直到處看。
#e Until here, he keeps on shouting and looking: “Where did you go?”
#c 然後這裡呢，他在這裡一直喊叫一直找說：「在哪裡走丟呢？」
#e That frog disappeared!
#c 那隻青蛙消失了。
#e Then there’s only the dog looking up and calling for it.
#c 然後只有狗在往上看，並且一直叫著。
#n kaupa=s < kaupa mas
#n kui < mikui
#e It’s not in the house. What should we do?
#c 家裡也沒有，該怎麼辦！

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格

free: #e Then the dog also got into the bottle.
#c 然後那隻狗也就到瓶子裡面。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格
主焦-狀態-重疊-從懸崖往下看
free: #e The boy kept on looking down from the window and waiting.
#c 那個孩子在窗口往下望著，一直等待著。
#e Then the dog also came. He held it tightly.
#c 然後狗也來，他把狗抓起抱緊。
#e But there was still no trace of the frog.
#c 然後還是沒有青蛙。
#e Are there two of them? [boy and dog]
#c 是不是會有兩個？ [孩子跟狗]
#n 發音人的自我疑問。
#e Here, they were still calling and leaving the house.
#c 然後到了這裡呢，他們還在叫喊著，一邊從家裡出去。
#e The two of them went together, calling out loud and looking around.
#c 兩個人一邊一起走著，一邊叫喊，一邊找尋。
#e It was not there. Then in the forest they saw there was a hornet nest on the tree.
#c 沒有。然後他們在樹林裡看得到有虎頭蜂窩掛在樹上。
#n mus是口誤。

gloss: 可見.遠距-途中某處-那裡
free: #n iskadii 到那邊（但不是終點）
#n akadii < askadii
#e Not here. Then the hornets flied out around one by one.
#c 沒有。然後虎頭一隻一隻飛出來，到處飛。
#e The dog wanted to climb up the whole time to eat the hornet nest.
#c 狗一直想要爬上去吃虎頭蜂。

gloss: 可見.遠距=那裡=遠距.主格
free: #e He kept on looking if the frog was inside.
#c 他一直看青蛙是不是在裡面。

gloss: 變成-到-對面=改變狀態=遠距.斜格
free: #n amus < aimushangsia

gloss: 可見.遠距=那裡=遠距.主格

free: #e It turns out on the next page that the kid was afraid when he looked inside the hole, the nest would suddenly drop. Then the frog kept on seeing how the kid covered his face.
#c 原來，在下一頁孩子擔心當他在觀察洞裡的時候，那個虎頭蜂窩會掉下來。然後青蛙一直繼續觀察到底這個孩子會如何擋他的臉。
#e That dog wants to eat the hornets.
#c 那隻狗想要吃虎頭蜂。
#n miku=in < mikui=in
#e But the child was afraid. What should he do if he is chased since it suddenly knows?
#c 孩子害怕，如果突然知道，被追了要怎麼辦。
#n 這裡的 ka- 可能不是一個有意義的prefix。可以參考De Busser (2009)。
#e That dog was not afraid, staying there and looking up, eager to eat.
#c 那隻狗不怕，繼續往上看，想要吃。

gloss: 可見.遠距=那裡=遠距.主格
可見.遠距=那裡=遠距.主格
非實現=吃-受焦=1IPL.主格=斜格
可見.遠距-途中某處-那裡
free: #e It was pulled down… Look, suddenly they all turned their heads — those hornets that would eat us were just coming out from the nest which had dropped down.
#c 因為那個被拉掉下來... 看吧！他們突然都轉頭，那些要吃我們的虎頭蜂，就從牠們掉下來的家出來了。
#e (They) chased the person till there. What could he do?
#c （他們）追他追到那去了。他怎麼辦呢？
#e Would he hide in that forest? Was there a wall?
#c 他會躲在那個森林？還是這裡會有牆壁嗎？
#e He hides inside that tree.
#c 他躲在那棵樹裡面。
#e He would be chased by the hornets.
#c 他會被虎頭蜂追。
#n valavala = 悠哉悠哉，或 不知不覺
#e But that dog, still unaware, kept looking up at the tree for the hornet’s nest that had already fallen down.
#c 可是那隻狗，還是毫無知覺地，在樹木那邊虎視眈眈地往上看那已經掉下來的虎頭蜂窩。
#e Everybody was afraid over there and kept waiting and screaming “where is our mom?”
#c 大家害怕，一邊等待一邊大叫：「媽媽到底在哪裡？」

gloss: 可見-途中某處-那裡=遠距.主格
free: #e Then there, an owl came, and then the hornets got there.
#c 然後那裡，來了一隻貓頭鷹，而虎頭蜂也到了那裡。
#e The dog was chased because he had taken down (the hornet).
#c 狗被追，是因為牠弄掉了（虎頭蜂窩）。
#e As for the children, who kicked him?
#c 然後孩子，是誰踢的呢？
#e He fell on his back at where he had hidden.
#c 他四腳朝天地倒在他躲過的地方。
#e The frog still could’t be found.
#c 可是仍然找不到青蛙。
#e Who had kicked it?
#c 是誰踢的？
#e It was the owl, right?
#c 是貓頭鷹吧？
#e It was kicked by the owl, right?
#c 是被貓頭鷹踢的，是吧？
#e It turned out the owl was inside the tree. It went in there and found and kicked him out.
#c 原來貓頭鷹在樹裡面。他到裡面一直找，然後把他踢了。

gloss: 可見.遠距-途中某處-那裡
主焦<重疊>追趕=遠距.主格
free: #e Then the dog suddenly ran off because the hornets there kept chasing (it).
#c 狗就突然跑走，因為那邊的虎頭蜂一直在追。
#n kui < mikui

gloss: 可見.遠距-途中某處-那裡

free: #e Then all the young people went there and tried their best to cover their head. How would it be if the hornets came? Just this way.
#c 然後所以年輕人從那邊去那邊，盡量在那裡擋住頭。如果虎頭蜂來的話要怎麼辦？所以這樣。
#e He was still calling but still it wasn’t there. Then it was deer’s antlers — the deer came out.
#c 她一直叫著，但還是沒有，然後有了水鹿的鹿角，水鹿出現了。
#n ‘hanvang' can be both cow 牛 or deer 水鹿
#n consequently, ‘ngabul’ are horns of a bull 牛角 or antlers 鹿角
#e Will it help him?
#c 牠會幫助他嗎？
#e Then how would the dog that is already on the other side get there?
#c 然後已經到對面的狗怎麼到的呢？
#e He is in the mountain.
#c 他在山上。
#e There was a deer, it keeps on calling a frog.
#c 有一隻鹿，一直叫著青蛙。
#e It kept calling the frog: “Come!” But still he didn’t come.
#c 他一直叫那個青蛙：「來吧！」但一直沒有來。

gloss: 主焦-前進-外面-改變狀態
可見.遠距-重疊-上面=那裡

free: #e Then there, the deer came out with the child kept yelling on it. The dog yelled and searched below.
#c 然後那邊，水鹿出來了，孩子在上面一直叫。狗也在下面叫著，尋找著。

gloss: 可見.遠距-途中某處-那裡=改變狀態
free: #e Then there, the deer carried the child on its back.
#c 然後，鹿背著孩子。

gloss: 可見.遠距-途中某處-那裡

free: #e The dog got there and looked on the grass, but it wasn’t there; on the tree, but it wasn’t there.
#c 到了那邊，狗在草裡找，沒有；他在樹上找，沒有。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格
可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格

free: #e Then there it was. Because there was still nothing to be found, the dog got there and found the frog.
#c 然後有了那個。因為那裡還是沒有找到，狗到那邊找到青蛙。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格
free: #e Uhm, how was it over there, he was kicked, he fell.
#c 嗯，然後怎麼了，他被踢了，他掉下來了
#n ai < hai. This IU is considered weird by the transcriber.
#e Did he come out from the grass there?
#c 他是不是從這個草出來的？

gloss: 變成-到-處格.近距=遠距.斜格
可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格
free: #n aiz=in < aiza=in
#e To there, there were two birds and a nest, an empty nest.
#c 到那邊有了兩隻鳥和巢，空巢。

gloss: 非實現=變成-到-處格.近距=遠距.斜格

free: #e To there, later when they saw… How would he go inside the forest?
#c 到那邊，因為當他們待會看到... 他們怎麼進到那個樹林？
#n =cia是對的嗎？

gloss: 主焦-前進-外面-中距.主格
free: #e Just like that, like what I see, the deer saved them, the frog and the deer’s appearance.
#c 就像這樣，像我所看到的，水鹿救了他們，青蛙和水鹿的出現。
#e So, they didn’t get saved?
#c 這樣子，沒有救他們嗎？

gloss: 人一起-二-處焦=改變狀態
free: #e Then, the child and the dog lay down together.
#c 然後，孩子和狗兩個一起躺著。

gloss: 主焦-前進-外面-改變狀態

free: #e They came out of the water, they were thrown in the water.
#c 他們從水出來，他們被丟進水去了。
#e That deer kept seeing if they were saved.
#c 那隻鹿一直觀察他們是否被救。

gloss: 主焦-前進-外面-改變狀態
free: #e Here (on this page), they came out of the water.
#c 到那邊，他們從水中出來。
#e Then, on the contrary, the dog was saved by being held on his head.
#c 然後，相反，小狗被他頂在頭上救。
#e The frog still hadn’t come out yet.
#c 青蛙還沒出來。
#e Here, did the frog come out?
#c 到了這裡，青蛙出來嗎？
#n kaa tu pataliva 應該是說錯了。
#e Here, the dog came out from the water and it was told not to speak because there would be frogs.
#c 到這裡，狗從水出來，他叫狗不要出聲，會有青蛙。
#n pataliva 是請別人安靜。
#e Then here (on this page), the dog came out. Would it pull out frogs there?
#c 到那裡，狗出現。他會不會把青蛙拉出來？

gloss: 主焦-狀態-<Ca重疊>從懸崖往下看

free: #e The child looked down from the piece of wood.
#c 孩子從木頭往下面看。
#e He kept looking over there, wondering if the frog would appear.
#c 他那邊一直看青蛙來了沒。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=中距.屬格

free: #e Then he told the dog not to bark or howl.
#c 然後他叫狗不要汪汪地吠或嗥叫。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=改變狀態

free: #e Then here, there were really two frogs together.
#c 這裡，真的有兩隻青蛙在一起。
#e They were happy that here it was.
#c 他們很開心有了他。
#e The dog would go take and save him, holding him in his arms.
#c 狗要去救他，把他抱起來。
#e Then there, they went on the wood.
#c 然後，他們到木頭上面了。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=改變狀態
可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格
free: #e Many frogs were found there.
#c 找到了很多青蛙。
#e They became very happy because he and many children, siblings and the like were there.
#c 他們高興了，因為他和孩子，兄弟姊妹之類的很多在那邊。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.斜格
free: #e There then they grabbed their mother.
#c 他們那裡就抓他們的母親。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格
free: #e The father and mother had so many children.
#c 爸爸媽媽有了很多很多那樣的孩子。
#n supah is lengthened
#n adu tama a-dii=a adu cina a-dii=a
#e They became so happy for the fact that there was a big family, with a dog, a child, and also a frog.
#c 他們很開心有了一個那麼多人的家庭，有狗和小孩，也有了青蛙。
#e Like this, like that.
#c 這樣那樣的。

gloss: 非實現=主焦-去-路=改變狀態
free: #e They were leaving, the dog took one away.
#c 他們準備要走了，他們一個被狗帶走。
#e They were leaving far off.
#c 他們要遠離。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.斜格
非實現=主焦-去-路=改變狀態
free: #e They shouted to them: “Bye-bye! See you!” (They) were leaving.
#c 他們向他們大喊大叫：「掰掰你們，再見！」就要走了。
#e It looks like they were sent off there.
#c 看起來，他們在那邊被歡送了。
#n mudaan < tundaan？
#e The frog left while being held.
#c 青蛙被提著走。
#e The dog was made to walk in front.
#c 狗被叫到前面。
#e That’s it.
#c 講完了。
